content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 31, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 28}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 51, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft lime_terracotta, I need to place 1 terracotta and 1 lime_dye side by side in the crafting grid. The terracotta is at slot 28, therefore I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 31, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 28}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 51, "index": 45}]
thought: I have moved the terracotta to slot 1, now I need to move the lime_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the lime_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
